flavorText: Night after night, Rosheen babbled about a bygone sunlit world, her every word dismissed as a madwoman's ravings.

foreignData.flavorText: Nacht um Nacht erzählte Rosheen von einer vergangenen, sonnenüberfluteten Welt, doch alles, was sie sagte, wurde als Geplapper einer Verrückten abgetan.
foreignData.name: Rosheen Mäanderer
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {4}. Verwende dieses Mana nur für Kosten, die {X} enthalten.

foreignData.flavorText: Noche tras noche, Rosheen balbucea sobre un mundo soleado, pero sus palabras son tratadas como el parloteo de un loco.
foreignData.name: Rosheen Meanderer
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {4} a tu reserva de maná. Usa este maná sólo en costes que contengan {X}.

foreignData.flavorText: Chaque nuit, Rosheen balbutiait quelque chose à propos d'un monde baigné de soleil, ce que tout le monde considérait comme les divagations d'une folle.
foreignData.name: Rosheen l'Erratique
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez {4} à votre réserve. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour des coûts qui contiennent {X}.

foreignData.flavorText: Notte dopo notte, Rosheen balbettava di un mondo scomparso di luce solare, ma ogni sua singola parola veniva considerata il vaneggiare di un donna impazzita.
foreignData.name: Rosheen dei Vaneggiamenti
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi {4} alla tua riserva di mana. Spendi questo mana solo per costi che contengono {X}.

foreignData.flavorText: 毎夜、ロシーンは過ぎ去った陽の照る世界のことをつぶやいていたが、彼女の言葉は狂人の振る舞いとして片付けられていた。
foreignData.name: 曲がりくねりのロシーン
foreignData.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{4}を加える。 このマナは{X}を含むコストにのみ使用できる。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 巨人・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: Noite após noite, Rosheen tagarelava sobre um mundo ensolarado do passado, cada palavra desprezada como delírios de uma velha louca.
foreignData.name: Rosheen Logorréia
foreignData.text: {T}: Adicione {4} à sua reserva de mana. Gaste este mana apenas com custos que contenham {X}.

foreignData.flavorText: Ночь за ночью Роушин бормотала об ушедшем мире, залитом солнцем, но никто не верил ни одному ее слову, считая ее сказания бредом сумасшедшей старухи.
foreignData.name: Роушин Пустомеля
foreignData.text: {T}: добавьте {4} в ваше хранилище маны. Тратьте эту ману только для оплаты стоимостей, в которых есть {X}.

foreignData.flavorText: 罗欣每晚都絮叨着某个已逝的阳光充盈世界，而每字每句都只给当成疯女人的胡言乱语。
foreignData.name: 漫步人罗欣
foreignData.text: {T}：加{4}到你的法术力池中。 此法术力只能用来支付包含{X}的费用。

name: Rosheen Meanderer
originalText: {T}: Add {4} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.

rulings.text: A “cost that contains {X}” may be a spell’s total cost, an activated ability’s cost, a suspend cost, or a cost you’re asked to pay as part of the resolution of a spell or ability (such as Condescend). A spell’s total cost includes either its mana cost (printed in the upper right corner) or its alternative cost (such as flashback), as well as any additional costs (such as kicker). If it’s something you can spend mana on, it’s a cost. If that cost includes the {X} symbol in it, you can spend mana generated by Rosheen on that cost.
You can spend mana generated by Rosheen on any part of a cost that contains {X}. You’re not limited to spending it only on the {X} part.

You can spend mana generated by Rosheen on a cost that includes {X} even if you’ve chosen an X of 0, or if the card specifies that you can spend only colored mana on X. (You’ll have to spend Rosheen’s mana on a different part of that cost, of course.)
You don’t have to spend all four mana on the same cost.

text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.
